MTS_question.Description: Response to whether the participant believes they have mirror-touch synesthesia

Levels.Yes: Participant believes they have mirror-touch synesthesia
Levels.No: Participant does not believe they have mirror-touch synesthesia

Experience.Description: Participant's description of what the experience of mirror-touch synesthesia is like

Reliability.Description: Response to whether the participant always feels touch when seeing someone else being touched or only in certain circumstances

Localisation.Description: Description of where on their body the participant feels the mirror-touch sensations, including whether the sensation is in the same place as the observed touch or more general
